description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Features

SLIDESNET-33359	Presentation thumbnail in Windows Explorer is not updated when presentation is modified using Aspose.Slides

	Enhancement

SLIDESNET-33490	Support for adding secondary Y-axis or Category axis in chart

	Investigations

SLIDESNET-33293	Conversion of ppt to pdf takes processing time 5 times more than same pptx
SLIDESNET-33434	Aspose.Slides for .NET - Mono supported version (XL#41444)
SLIDESNET-33451	Getting 'Slide cloning error' while cloning slides with video
SLIDESNET-33503	Does Aspose.Slides for .NET support Silverlight

	Bugs

SLIDESNET-22381	Master file changed when saving the PPT
SLIDESNET-28485	Slide header color changed in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-29081	The wrong font and in reverse direction is rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-29343	Wrong chart Type rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-32168	PPT to PDF conversion line and text issue
SLIDESNET-32268	PPT to PDF conversion issue
SLIDESNET-32446	ChartEx.HasLegend does not work
SLIDESNET-33129	Slide text and its color missing in generated thumbnails
SLIDESNET-33184	After hiding data labels of a chart with the help Aspose.Slides. PowerPoint 2007 is not showing but one can see these labels in MS PowerPoint 2010
SLIDESNET-33285	Chart colors changed when generating slide thumbnail of cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33309	ArgumentNullException thrown on generating PDF
SLIDESNET-33383	Bullet Indent lost when Aspose.Slides generated presentation is opened in PowerPoint 2011 for MAC
SLIDESNET-33420	got this error creating new Presentation and PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-33441	Chart missing in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33460	Bullet-to-text spacing are wrong or they are missing.
SLIDESNET-33475	Slide text missing in generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33476	Graph is improperly rendered in thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33479	Bad view of lines in Adobe Reader
SLIDESNET-33481	Image has an artifact on top
SLIDESNET-33484	Arrows are not rendered
SLIDESNET-33485	Aspose.Slides for .NET 4 client profile assembly failed to load
SLIDESNET-33496	Chart missing in generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33506	Incorrect position of a chart labels.
SLIDESNET-33517	Exception during opening of a PPTX presentation
SLIDESNET-33518	Exception during opening of a PPT presentation
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
